summary: Dulce is a mother of two who experiences terrifying encounters with apparitions inside her old house, a place where a tragedy occurs. Thirty years later, an elderly Dulce returns home to decipher the mystery that has tormented her for so long.
cast: Ruddy Rodríguez|Guillermo Garcia|Rosmel Bustamante|Gonzalo Cubero|Héctor Mercado|Yucemar Morales|Efraín Romero|Simona Chirinos|Adriana Calzadilla|José León|Alexander Da Silva|Guillermo Londoño|Miguel Flores|Amanda Key|Miguel Angel Pacheco
title: La casa del fin de los tiempos
